entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Greetings! 👋🏻 Welcome to my homepage.

About me

I received my bachelor degree of Vehicle engineering , College of Automotive and Mechanical Engineering, The Changsha University of Science and Technology.

My research focuses on Machine Learning, specifically the area of Intelligent transportation and Autonomous driving.

Educations

  • Changsha University of Science and Technology
    Bachelor in Vehicle Engineering, from August 2018 to June 2022.
  • GPA: 3.42/4.0. Ranking:3/132

Publications

  • Modeling and Analysis of Buffer System in Electromagnetic Riveter
    Raeed Al-Sabri, Zhihui Fu, Yunkai Huang, Xu Zhang, Babatounde Moctard Oloulade, Mengjia Li.
    Mechanical Engineering and Technology, 2021, 10(3) .
    [paper]
